citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The facility has had a new part-time attending veterinarian (AV) since June of 2024. The AV has not established a written
program of veterinary care (PVC) for the facility. This document is required to ensure the facility has a guide to follow
concerning the care of the animals, including preventive care, emergency care, euthanasia, and other topics, for the
health and well-being of the animals. Each exhibitor shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements. In
the case of a part-time attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal arrangements shall include a written
program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises of the exhibitor.
To be corrected by October 4, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The facility has had a new part-time attending veterinarian (AV) since June of 2024. The AV has not established a written 
program of veterinary care (PVC) for the facility. This document is required to ensure the facility has a guide to follow 
concerning the care of the animals, including preventive care, emergency care, euthanasia, and other topics, for the 
health and well-being of the animals. Each exhibitor shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements. In 
the case of a part-time attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal arrangements shall include a written 
program of veterinary care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises of the exhibitor. 
To be corrected by October 4, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
